about_the_game:
This game has several levels and stages.
where each level requires a different strategy to advance.
use equipment or accessories to advance, collect pets to help in battles.
each pet has a specific spell combo.
each boss has a different difficulty according to the play style.

This game recalls the molds of the old titles, with fast movement and action.
The artwork in this game is unlike anything you've ever imagined.
detailed_description:
This game has several levels and stages.
where each level requires a different strategy to advance.
use equipment or accessories to advance, collect pets to help in battles.
each pet has a specific spell combo.
each boss has a different difficulty according to the play style.

This game recalls the molds of the old titles, with fast movement and action.
The artwork in this game is unlike anything you've ever imagined.

name: PINO THE ELEMENTAL

subs.option_text: Pino The Elemental - Book of the Earth - $0.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS
  • Processor: DUAL CORE or BETTER
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS
  • Processor: DUAL CORE or BETTER
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: Adventure game in hack slash style, with different spells and pets, enemies with different difficulties, high difficulty level against bosses.
